DataElement.preferredName: Arm and Breast Symptom Questionnaire 19 Past 7 Days How Much Bothered by Tingling in Affected Breast or Chest Area Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how much they have been bothered in the past 7 days by tingling sensation ("pins & needles") in their affected breast or chest area, using a 5-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Arm and Breast Symptom Questionnaire Past Week How Much Bothered by Tingling in Affected Breast or Chest Area Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the elbow. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole superior limb._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest._Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._The most recent week, including today._A question about how bothered an individual is by tingling sensation in their breast or chest area._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.longName: How Much Bothered by Tingling in Affected Breast or Chest Area

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: Arm and Breast Symptom Questionnaire Bothered 5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric scores from 1 (not at all difficult) to 5 (Unable to do) on a 5-point Likert scale.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was not bothered at all.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was not bothered at all.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was bothered just a little.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was bothered just a little.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was somewhat bothered.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was somewhat bothered.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was quite a bit bothered.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was quite a bit bothered.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was very bothered.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was very bothered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
